title: *****9/1 NEWLY RENOVATED 3 BED SPLIT STEPS TO COMM AVE & 1/2 FEE PAID!
posting_body: A very spacious, and completely gut-renovated 2 OR 3 bedroom (SPLIT-STYLE*), 1 bath rental apartment located on Sutherland Rd in Brighton.

The unit is located in a professionally managed building that is located just steps to the MBTA Green Line,  Commonwealth Ave, Boston University, Harvard Ave, Brookine & Beacon St, and Boston College!
Heat and hot water are included in the rent price, and there is shared laundry in the building.
*A split-style unit is a traditional 2 bedroom unit with a living room.
The living room in this unit can be used as the third bedroom if needed, however, as there is only one entrance to the living room.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Englewood Ave (0.30 mi)
Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.47 mi)
Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.36 mi)
Bus: 65 Washington St @ Commonwealth Ave (0.35 mi)
